{{Lang|'''Yiran'''|zh=一然|zh_rm=Yīrán}} is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. She can be found at [[Granny Shan]]'s stall in Chihu Rock. She only appears during daytime together with her father [[Manager Kuan]].

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Yiran is Manager Kuan's daughter, but refuses to address him as such due to her self-perceived standards when it comes to work.
